comment: How did this turnout for you?

Great.  I did make a modification on Batch 2 which was 2 Tablespoons of Pumpkin Spice to the Mash but I enjoy the aroma of Pumpkin Spice.  I also bottled using Molasses which produced a nice tight Copper head.
Nice.  Did adding the spice at the start of the mash work better then 20 min left of the boil?
It did.  I got the idea from Stone's 12.12.12 Clone Recipe  http://www.stonebrewing.com/blog/miscellany/2012/brewing-stone-121212-vertical-epic-ale-home#ageGatePassed
